thread.title: Want to write a better game? Try watching some TV

title: Want to write a better game? Try watching some TV
text:
Want to write a better game? Try watching some TV 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
Remedy Entertainment's Sam Lake takes a break from making Quantum Break to talk about how TV offers useful lessons on how to craft character...
